This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=CIAS.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-02-18T14:56:55Z Michael Eades 2015-02-18T14:54:41+00:00 2015-02-18T14:54:41+00:00 Being Human Festival CFP Released! https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CIAS;f736cbb6.1502 [cid:image007.jpg@01D04B8A.D1872750]<br><br>Dear CIAS members,<br><br>I am delighted to announce that the Being Human festival of the humanities will be returning in 2015 between 12-22 November. Our call for participation in this year's festival is now live and can be viewed on our website<http://beinghumanfestival.org/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Being-Human-Public-Call-for-Submissions-2015.pdf>.<br><br>Being Human is the UK's only national festival of the humanities. Coordinated by the School of Advanced Study<http://www.sas.ac.uk/support-research/public-engagement>, University of London in partnership with the Arts & Humanities Research Council (AHRC)<http://www.ahrc.ac.uk/Pages/Home.aspx> and the British Academy,<http://www.britac.ac.uk/> in 2014 the festival featured 162 events organised by over 100 universities and cultural organisations across the country. In 2015, it is [...] Sarah Allan 2015-01-13T09:57:57+00:00 2015-01-13T09:57:57+00:00 FW: Call For Papers - Taft Graduate Humanities Conference https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CIAS;ee4f771f.1501 Sarah Allan<br>Executive Assistant to the Dean & Chief Executive and Office Manager<br>[cid:image001.jpg@01D01BB4.52D10E40]<http://www.sas.ac.uk/><br>SAS celebrates the 20th anniversary of its official opening on 15 March 1995 as the UK\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds national centre for the support and promotion of research in the humanities.<br>Dean's Office<br>Senate House (Room 215), Malet Street, London WC1E 7HU<br>Tel: 0207 862 8736 / Fax: 0207 862 8657<br>E: mailto:sarah.allan@sas.ac.uk/W: www.sas.ac.uk<http://www.sas.ac.uk/> [...] Sarah Allan 2014-12-19T09:12:05+00:00 2014-12-19T09:12:05+00:00 FW: Postdoctoral bursary opportunity, University of Nottingham https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CIAS;50d4e6e1.1412 Dear members<br><br>Herewith details of a post-doctoral bursary opportunity at Nottingham. Deadline for receipt of applications: Friday 30th January 2015.<br><br>Sarah Allan<br>Executive Assistant to the Dean & Chief Executive and Office Manager<br><br>[SAS.gif]<http://www.sas.ac.uk/><br><br>School of Advanced Study, University of London<br>Supporting world-class research in the humanities<br><br>Dean's Office<br>Senate House (Room 215), Malet Street, London WC1E 7HU<br>Tel: 0207 862 8736 / Fax: 0207 862 8657<br>E: mailto:sarah.allan@sas.ac.uk/W: www.sas.ac.uk<http://www.sas.ac.uk/> [...] Michael Eades 2014-10-22T15:57:27+00:00 2014-10-22T15:57:27+00:00 Being Human launch - 15th November https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CIAS;2b6505f2.1410 Dear CIAS members,<br><br>We would like to warmly invite you to the official launch of Being Human, the UK's first national festival of the humanities.<br><br>Led by the School of Advanced Study, University of London in partnership with the Arts & Humanities Research Council and the British Academy, between 15-23 November 2014 Being Human will bring together over 150 events across the country dedicated to building public understanding of the humanities. [...] Sarah Allan 2014-10-09T10:24:50+00:00 2014-10-09T10:24:50+00:00 CIAS meeting 23 October 2014 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CIAS;7a071392.1410 Dear Members<br><br>Please find attached the agenda for the meeting to be held on 23 October in room 243 at Senate House, Malet Street, London, WC1. As usual we will meet over lunch, starting at 12.30.<br><br>The main item for discussion is the forthcoming Being Human Festival.<br><br>Please do let me know if you have any other items that you would like to add to the agenda. [...] Sarah Allan 2014-10-02T15:44:14+00:00 2014-10-02T15:44:14+00:00 FW: The Utopian Universities, a 50 year retrospective: conference at the Institute of Historical Research, 23-24 October 2014 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CIAS;9416ba9b.1410 Dear Colleagues,<br><br>Please find attached a letter advertising a conference about the new universities of the 1960s being held next month at the Institute of Historical Research in London. Taking place in our new Wolfson Conference Suite, it is the first large event in the Institute following a major refurbishment.<br><br>I do hope you might be able to come. Please circulate this information to anyone you think might be interested in the conference. And don't hesitate to contact me should you require further details. [...] Sarah Allan 2014-08-27T10:24:42+00:00 2014-08-27T10:24:42+00:00 FW: [Exchanges: the Warwick Research Journal] Call for Papers - Vol 2 (2) https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CIAS;d563bfbd.1408 Please see below a call for papers from the Warwick Research Journal - please circulate amongst relevant staff.<br><br>Contact for further details is Karen Simecek at Warwick k.d.simecek@warwick.ac.uk<mailto:k.d.simecek@warwick.ac.uk> Michael Eades 2014-08-19T15:02:01+00:00 2014-08-19T15:02:01+00:00 Being Human August e-news https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CIAS;ab163207.1408 Dear all,<br><br>Please see below for our August news roundup for the Being Human festival. Apologies for cross-posting, but we do hope that you will find the information below of interest.<br><br>Please do encourage your colleagues to follow the festival on Twitter and to sign up to our e-newsletter by visiting: http://beinghumanfestival.org/e-news-sign-up/ [...] Sarah Allan 2014-08-05T09:50:39+00:00 2014-08-05T09:50:39+00:00 CIAS Autumn Meeting https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CIAS;5455878e.1408 Dear CIAS Members<br><br>Many thanks for all responses regarding a date for the autumn meeting.<br><br>I can now confirm that the meeting will be held on Thursday 23 October at 12.30 in Room 243, Senate House, Malet Street, London WC1E 7HU.<br><br>We will meet over a working lunch.<br><br>Best wishes,<br>Sarah<br><br>Sarah Allan<br>Executive Assistant to the Dean & Chief Executive and Office Manager [...] Sarah Allan 2014-07-25T09:03:08+00:00 2014-07-25T09:03:08+00:00 CIAS Autumn Meeting - proposed date https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CIAS;ba35db32.1407 Dear Members<br><br>At our last meeting there was a discussion around the autumn meeting. A provisional date of 24 September was suggested but it was felt that it may be better to have a meeting closer to the Humanities Festival in November.<br><br>Could you let me know if you would be available for a meeting on Thursday 23 October (12.30-3.00) [...] Sarah Allan 2014-05-15T08:31:41+00:00 2014-05-15T08:31:41+00:00 FW: Intensive summer course https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CIAS;7fb16e2.1405 Dear All<br><br>I am circulating information regarding a summer school being offered by Rosi Braidotti from Utrecht University. Please could you circulate this amongst your contacts.<br><br>Sarah Allan<br>Executive Assistant to the Dean & Chief Executive and Office Manager<br><br>[SAS.gif]<http://www.sas.ac.uk/><br><br>School of Advanced Study, University of London<br>Supporting world-class research in the humanities<br><br>Dean's Office<br>Senate House (Room 215), Malet Street, London WC1E 7HU<br>Tel: 0207 862 8736 / Fax: 0207 862 8657<br>E: mailto:sarah.allan@sas.ac.uk/W: www.sas.ac.uk<http://www.sas.ac.uk/> [...] Sarah Allan 2014-05-06T14:09:18+00:00 2014-05-06T14:09:18+00:00 Warwick IAS - Exchanges: launch of issue 2 and call for papers https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CIAS;350f8e8.1405 The IAS at the University of Warwick has launched the first volume of Exchanges (issue 1 and 2), featuring articles with Oliver Sacks and Mona Siddiqui amongst others.<br><br>The interdisciplinary journal is online, open access (with no charge), peer reviewed and welcomes articles from all fields.<br><br>A call for papers is also below. [...] Sarah Allan 2014-04-16T15:04:13+00:00 2014-04-16T15:04:13+00:00 EURIAS Fellowships https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CIAS;13fde324.1404 Dear Members<br><br>Please see below a call for fellowship applications from Edinburgh who are participating in the EURIAS Fellowship Programme. Please could you share with those who may be interested in applying.<br><br>The European Institutes for Advanced Study (EURIAS) has just issued a call for applications for the 2015-16 EURIAS Fellowship Programme. Our Institute is one of the 16 participating institutes around Europe and is offering one senior and one junior fellowship for research in the humanities and social sciences. The deadline for applications is 5 June 2014. Full details can be found on the EURIAS website (http://www.2015-2016.eurias-fp.eu/). [...] Sarah Allan 2014-04-14T08:25:37+00:00 2014-04-14T08:25:37+00:00 FW: [OWNERS-ANNOUNCE] Issue affecting Yahoo email subscribers to lists https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CIAS;68df357a.1404 Dear All<br><br>I don't think any CIAS members use yahoo email account but thought it wise to circulate this message from Jisc concerning problems with yahoo accounts.<br><br>Best wishes<br><br>Sarah Allan<br>Executive Assistant to the Dean & Chief Executive and Office Manager<br><br>School of Advanced Study, University of London<br>Supporting world-class research in the humanities<br><br>Dean's Office<br>Senate House (Room 215), Malet Street, London WC1E 7HU<br>Tel: 0207 862 8736 / Fax: 0207 862 8657<br>E: mailto:sarah.allan@sas.ac.uk/W: www.sas.ac.uk [...]
